Author: Julian
Comment: I was told the throne was made of aluminium, then gold plated, aluminium being quite an expensive and modern metal back then.

Author: Phil
Comment: Hmm, haven’t found confirmation either way, but it did lead me to to an online version of the 1922 Encyclopdia Brittanica, which was quite strange, but entertainingly written. <http://www.1911encyclopedia.org/Throne>
